issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Vague error when user does not have access to create stack

comments.body:

@ccassler, that shows preparation for a PUT to objectstorage, but not the response from the service.
[~dkavanagh]: That's all that was returned by the eucaconsole.log in debug mode.
I think this will be addressed in the GUI-1340 fix.
[~dkavanagh]: Now that the fix for GUI-1340 is in master, are we still observing this error?  /cc [~ccassler]
[~dkavanagh]: I'm still seeing the vague error described in this bug.
I just reproduced this and yes, odd that boto isn't spitting out the response body, though it says the length is 278 characters.

[~dkavanagh]: Looks like it was partially fixed.  I'm seeing the unauthorized error but i'm also presented with the logout screen as in bug GUI-1340.  I have included the debug logging from eucaconsole.log below as well as a screenshot of the issue.
